lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 2 (AP) -- Donald M. Nelson, WPB chief, has set the placing of at least $1,000,000,000 in contracts as the goal of the Smaller War Plants Corporation in 1943 and the directorate may be reshuffled for greater efficiency.
snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 2 (AP) -- Donald M. Nelson, WPB chief, has set the placing of at least $1,000,000,000 in contracts as the goal of the Smaller War Plants Corporation in 1943 and the directorate may be reshuffled for greater efficiency....
